subject: Football
Traffic Accidents and Safety
Interscholastic Athletics
lead_paragraph: Playing its first game since four players were killed in a car crash last month, Mainland Regional High School lost to Hammonton, 23-7, on Friday night in Linwood, N.J.
snippet: Playing its first game since four players were killed in a car crash last month, Mainland Regional High School lost to Hammonton, 23-7, on Friday night in Linwood, N.J.
